meanings.definition: Objects made of wood, especially for household use.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new woodenwares for our kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of woodenwares like cutting boards and utensils.
meanings.sent3: The woodenwares in the house always seem to bring a rustic charm.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of woodenwares was a forest of practicality in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The woodenwares gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their natural beauty.

meanings.definition: The trade or business of making wooden objects.
meanings.sent1: His family has been in the woodenwares business for generations.
meanings.sent2: The woodenwares industry is known for its craftsmanship and durability.
meanings.sent3: Starting a woodenwares shop seemed like a splinter of an idea at first.
meanings.sent4: In the world of woodenwares, he was a master craftsman, shaping dreams from timber.
meanings.sent5: The woodenwares market was booming, with new designs popping up every day.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being made of wood.
meanings.sent1: The sturdy woodenwares of the table impressed the guests.
meanings.sent2: The woodenwares of the chair showed signs of wear and tear over the years.
meanings.sent3: The woodenwares of the house creaked softly in the night, like a whisper of nature.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to using only the finest woodenwares was evident in every piece he crafted.
meanings.sent5: The woodenwares exuded a sense of warmth and comfort, inviting everyone to gather around.
